system.descriptionText: Passive Grenade Defence. Whenever a Vehicle with this is struck by a grenade roll 1d10, on a 7+ Grenade scatters 1d5 metres away before exploding. On a 1, Mesh is damaged and ceases to function until repaired. Also imposes -20 to set up explosives on the vehicle, such as Melta Bombs.
